query:
SELECT 
  expenseType as 'Expense Category',
  COUNT(*) as 'Count',
  ROUND(SUM(amount), 2) as 'Total Amount',
  ROUND(AVG(amount), 2) as 'Average',
  ROUND(MIN(amount), 2) as 'Min',
  ROUND(MAX(amount), 2) as 'Max'
FROM expenses
GROUP BY expenseType
ORDER BY SUM(amount) DESC;

  ROUND(AVG(amount), 2) as 'Average',

FROM expenses

ORDER BY SUM(amount) DESC;
